name: Adrian Enriquez
summary: I'm Adrian Enriquez, a freelance web developer with more than 2 years of experience. I design and develop websites for clients from all around the world as a freelancer. Constantly learning and experiencing new things.

services.name: UI/UX Design
services.description: I sketch and wireframe interfaces for mobile and web, create UI mockups using moqups.com web app and Adobe Photoshop.

services.name: Front-end Development
services.description: Superior skills in HTML(5), CSS(3), Responsive and Pixel Perfect Design. Expert in Twitter Bootstrap framework and I like converting PSD to HTML. Proficient in LESS/SCSS, Gulp.js, Grunt, Javascript, jQuery, Angular.js. Familiar with other html/css frameworks like Foundation and Polymer.

services.name: Back-end Development
services.description: I write clean codes using best practices and Object Oriented Programming(OOP). I'm good in php and my favorite framework is Laravel. Familiar with Node.js and express.js framework. I also develop REST APIs.

services.name: Mobile Development
services.description: I develop mobile applications using Phonegap and Ionic Framework.

services.name: Content Management Sytem(CMS)
services.description: I can setup, customize and/or craete Wordpress and Joomla Templates.

services.name: Other
services.description: I'm familiar with MySQL, MongoDB, Firebase. Good in using Version Control System like Git and SVN.
